Html:
To my knowledge, Resto Shaman cannot dual wield, so it seems a little confusing/cluttered seeing enchantments in the offhand section for weapons.  It seems it would be easier to understand if weapon enchants were removed from the Enchants->Off Hand section.  Or am I making a mistake there?

 

Thanks.

You can put an enchant on your shield however.    But yes, in that case it should only show the shield enchants for restos (or at least you should be able to tell from the enchant tooltips which enchants are for weapons and which are for shields.    I'm currently using the inscription off-hand for my shammy and Rawr optimiser puts a weapon enchant on it, but knows it isn't effective as removing it doesn't change the overall speelpower of the toon.  Overall the off-hand enchanting could be a bit more "elegant".
